p: Although leaf essential oil-treated embryos attempted to deposit the same egg number, with the same hatch rate as control in adulthood, all larvae could not make it until adulthood, and F1 adult emergence rate was significantly lower than control (84 ± 4%) in both essential oils group offspring (57.9 ± 6% and 48.3 ± 7% for leaf and flower essential oils, respectively) (Fig. 4e).
